name: Color Game (Working title)
description:
Credits:

Programming: Anna Perlow, Nicolette Antisdel, Shloak Sinha

Art Design: Tracie Thornbury

This game is a platformer with missing physics mechanics (such as gravity). These mechanics are spread throughout the world in the form of collectible objects/switches. Collecting/unlocking these mechanics adds more color to the game world and opens up new paths for the player to traverse. The goal is to unlock all the missing game mechanics so the player can finally reach the end and collect the final piece.
